tool_description: A Germany PostalCode Boundaries API that provides geographical boundaries for postal codes in Germany.

api_list.name: Query for Postal Code Boundary By location
api_list.description: Retrieve the postal code boundary based on specified geographical coordinates (longitude and latitude).

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the location for which the postal code boundary is queried.

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the location for which the postal code boundary is queried.

api_list.name: Query for all State names.
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all state names in Germany.

api_list.name: Query for Postal Code Boundary by postal code.
api_list.description: Retrieve the postal code boundary based on a specific postal code.

required_parameters.name: postalcode
required_parameters.description: The postal code for which the boundary is queried.

api_list.name: Query for City Names by State
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of city names within a specified state.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: The name of the state for which city names are queried.

api_list.name: Query for City Boundary by Name
api_list.description: Retrieve the boundary of a city based on its name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the city for which the boundary is queried.
